00034 class KVILIB_API KviProxy
00035 {
00036 public:
00037         enum Protocol { Socks4, Socks5, Http };
00038         KviProxy();
00039         KviProxy(const KviProxy &prx);
00040         ~KviProxy();
00041 public:
00042         QString             m_szHostname;
00043         QString             m_szIp;
00044         QString             m_szPass;
00045         QString             m_szUser;
00046         kvi_u32_t           m_uPort;
00047         Protocol            m_protocol;
00048         bool                m_bIsIPv6;
00049 public:
00050         bool isIPv6() const             { return m_bIsIPv6; };
00051         Protocol protocol() const       { return m_protocol; };
00052         const QString protocolName() const;
00053         void setNamedProtocol(const char * proto);
00054         kvi_u32_t port() const { return m_uPort; };
00055         const QString & user() const       { return m_szUser; };
00056         const QString & pass() const       { return m_szPass; };
00057         const QString & ip() const         { return m_szIp; };
00058         const QString & hostname() const   { return m_szHostname; };
00059         void normalizeUserAndPass();
00060         bool hasPass() const         { return !m_szPass.isEmpty(); };
00061         bool hasUser() const         { return !m_szUser.isEmpty(); };
00062         unsigned int passLen() const { return (unsigned int)m_szPass.length(); };
00063         unsigned int userLen() const { return (unsigned int)m_szUser.length(); };
00064         static void getSupportedProtocolNames(QStringList & buf);
00065 
00066         void setProtocol(Protocol p){ m_protocol = p; };
00067         void setIPv6(bool b){ if(b) m_bIsIPv6 = true; else m_bIsIPv6 = false; };
00068         void setPort(kvi_u32_t &p){ m_uPort = p; };
00069         void setUser(const QString &u){ m_szUser = u; };
00070         void setPass(const QString &p){ m_szPass = p; };
00071         void setIp(const QString &i){ m_szIp = i; };
00072         void setHostname(const QString &h){ m_szHostname = h; };
00073 };

00076 class KVILIB_API KviProxyDataBase
00077 {
00078 public:
00079         KviProxyDataBase();
00080         ~KviProxyDataBase();

00082         KviPointerList<KviProxy> * m_pProxyList;
00083         KviProxy                 * m_pCurrentProxy;
00084 public:
00085         void clear();

00087         KviProxy * currentProxy(){ return m_pCurrentProxy; };
00088         KviProxy * findProxy(const KviProxy * pProxy, bool bName);
00089         void updateProxyIp(const char * proxy,const char * ip);
00090         void setCurrentProxy(KviProxy * prx){ m_pCurrentProxy = prx; };
00091         void insertProxy(KviProxy * prx){ m_pProxyList->append(prx); };
00092         void load(const QString &filename);
00093         void save(const QString &filename);
